Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video does not show a UFO over an airport in Turkey.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the mysterious nature of the lights in the video, presenting them as evidence of a UFO.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the lights in the video are a UFO over an airport in Turkey.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the lights in the video are a UFO without considering alternative explanations.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation for the lights in the video, stating that it is an Atlas V rocket launched from Cape Canaveral, Florida.
Understate: There doesn't seem to be any understatement bias in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
